name: Orange Bird Lda
membership: Founding member of European Crowdfunding Network.
goal:
PPL.com.pt is the leading crowdfunding platform in Portugal. It operates in a donation and reward model.
Our goal is to promote Portuguese creativity and entrepreneurship through active community collaboration.
Besides PPL, Orange Bird also develops crowdfunding and crowdsourcing platforms (whitelabel) for other clients.
euInitiatives:
Our organization is a founding member of the European Crowdfunding Network (ECN) (http://www.eurocrowd.org/), a professional network promoting adequate transparency, (self) regulation and governance while offering a combined voice in policy discussion and public opinion building.
ECN was founded in 2011 as an interest group and formally incorporated as an international not-for-profit organisation in Brussels, Belgium in 2013.
